text: intent: implement kg web UX improvements as improve-web agent — SSE streaming, theme, mobile, streaming indicators

outcome: shipped 12 features across 3 rounds — inotify SSE (/agent/<name>/events), streaming turn indicators (_extract_turn_for_sse), light/dark theme, font slider 11-36px, hover previews, fetch()-based forms (mobile fix), messages newest-on-top, chat input at top, mobile CSS, session preview list, [[slug]] in messages+sessions, agent page links
gotcha: inotify sessions_dir may not exist at SSE connect — watch parent cfg.sessions_dir for CREATE event to detect when agent subdir is first created, then upgrade to direct watch
